mapper.select: SELECT softwareName ,APKName,softwaresize, (SELECT valueName FROM data_dictionary WHERE flatformId = valueId AND typeCode='APP_FLATFORM') AS valueName, CONCAT((SELECT categoryName FROM app_category WHERE app_category.id =categoryLevel1 ), '-->',(SELECT categoryName FROM app_category WHERE app_category.id =categoryLevel2 ), '-->',(SELECT categoryName FROM app_category WHERE app_category.id =categoryLevel3 )) AS categoryName, (SELECT valueName FROM data_dictionary WHERE typeCode = 'APP_STATUS' AND STATUS = valueId) AS valueName, downloads, (SELECT versionNo FROM app_version WHERE app_info.versionId=app_version.id ) AS versionNo FROM app_info LIMIT #{pageIndex},#{pageSize}
